single.searchString: index=cloudbridge (TemplateName="256_INGRESS" OR TemplateName="257_EGRESS") | join type=inner connectionId [search index=cloudbridge TemplateName="604_ACCELERATED" partnerCbInstanceId=$partnerCbInstanceId$ ] | `BW_SAVINGS_PERCENT`
index=cloudbridge TemplateName="604_ACCELERATED" partnerCbInstanceId=$partnerCbInstanceId$| stats count by `CONNECTION` | stats count

index=cloudbridge TemplateName="256_INGRESS" flowId = 1 | join type=inner connectionId [search index=cloudbridge TemplateName="604_ACCELERATED" partnerCbInstanceId=$partnerCbInstanceId$ ] | stats distinct_count(sourceIPv4Address) AS cnt | fields cnt

index=cloudbridge TemplateName="257_EGRESS" flowId = 4 roundTripTime >= 0 | join type=inner connectionId [search index=cloudbridge TemplateName="604_ACCELERATED" partnerCbInstanceId=$partnerCbInstanceId$ ] | stats avg(roundTripTime) as avg_wan_latency | fields avg_wan_latency

index=cloudbridge TemplateName="257_EGRESS" flowId = 4 roundTripTime >= 0 | join type=inner connectionId [search index=cloudbridge TemplateName="604_ACCELERATED" partnerCbInstanceId=$partnerCbInstanceId$ ] | stats sum(slowRTOs) AS wan_rtos | fields wan_rtos

chart.searchString: index=cloudbridge (TemplateName="256_INGRESS" OR TemplateName="257_EGRESS") (flowId=1 OR flowId=4) | join type=inner connectionId [search index=cloudbridge TemplateName="604_ACCELERATED" partnerCbInstanceId=$partnerCbInstanceId$ ] | eval sent=if(flowId==4, octetDeltaCount, 0) | eval received=if(flowId==1, octetDeltaCount, 0) | eval sent= `BYTES_TO_MBITS(sent)` | eval received = `BYTES_TO_MBITS(sent)` | timechart per_second(sent) AS "Sent" per_second(received) AS "Received"
chart.title: WAN Throughput

chart.searchString: index=cloudbridge (TemplateName="257_EGRESS") (flowId=2 OR flowId=4) roundTripTime >= 0 | join type=inner connectionId [search index=cloudbridge TemplateName="604_ACCELERATED" partnerCbInstanceId=$partnerCbInstanceId$ ] | eval type = if(flowId = 4, "WAN", "LAN") | timechart avg(roundTripTime) by type
chart.title: Latency(RTT)
